title: World Saving Operation
message: "This is a future. This is the last chance for the human race."
welcome_message: Welcome to the World Saving Operation
content_description: This is the starting screen of a global digital consciousness and justice system that will go live on May 19, 2025. It will be built on the brotherhood of peoples and a digital mission system.
simay_subtitle: The Platform for Updating the Republic with the People
simay_message: The Simay Movement is a platform that preserves the core values of the republic while carrying it into the future through people's participation, founded on brotherhood and justice.
simay_launch_date: May 19, 2025 - The Journey of Updating the Republic with the People

feedback.title: Share Your Thoughts
feedback.submit_error: Failed to submit your feedback. Please try again.

manifesto.title: Simay Movement Manifesto
manifesto.introduction: As the Simay Movement, we aim to preserve the core values of the republic while carrying it into the future through people's participation and strengthening social bonds.
manifesto.principle_1_desc: Preserving and strengthening the fundamental values of the republic by honoring Atat√ºrk's legacy
manifesto.principle_2_desc: A transparent governance approach where all decisions are made with public participation
manifesto.principle_3_desc: A fair social order where all segments of society are equally represented
manifesto.principle_4_desc: Continuous renewal of democracy according to the current needs of the people
manifesto.principle_5_desc: An understanding of diversity where different cultures and values are seen as richness
manifesto.conclusion: In the journey of updating and carrying the republic into the future with the people, we want to shape the future of society by implementing these values together.

join.title: Join the Movement
join.subtitle: Work with us for a brighter future
